sentences.sContent: Several players were suffering from cramp.

synos.tran: 痉挛，绞痛；[五金][机]铁夹钳
束缚，限制；使…抽筋；以铁箍扣紧
狭窄的；难解的；受限制的

words.tran: 用夹钳夹；约束（cramp的过去分词）

trans.tranCn: 抽筋, 腹部绞痛, 月经痛
trans.tranOther: a severe pain that you get in part of your body when a muscle becomes too tight, making it difficult for you to move that part of your body
